text: Mâ€™mwezi wa Ramazani ndi mmene Korani idavumbulutsidwa. Iyo ndi ulangizi kwa anthu ndi umboni wooneka wolangiza ndi kusiyanitsa. Motero aliyense wa inu amene wauona mwezi umenewu, ayenera kusala. Koma yense amene ali kudwala kapena ali paulendo, adzasale masiku ofanana ndi amene sadasale. Mulungu akufuna kukupeputsirani zinthu osati kuonjeza masautso ayi. (Iye) afuna kuti mukwaniritse kusala masiku onse olamulidwa ndiponso muyenera kumalemekeza Mulungu chifukwa chokutsogolerani kuti mukhale othokoza
